name: Canny
description: Finds edges in an image using the Canny86 algorithm.

parameters.name: threshold1
parameters.description: first threshold for the hysteresis procedure.

parameters.name: threshold2
parameters.description: second threshold for the hysteresis procedure.

parameters.name: apertureSize
parameters.description: aperture size for the Sobel() operator.

parameters.name: L2gradient
parameters.description: a flag, indicating whether a more accurate l2 norm = sqrt((dI/dx)^2+(dI/dy)^2 should be used to calculate the image gradient magnitude (L2gradient=true), or whether the default L1 norm = |dI/dx|+|dI/dy| is enough (L2gradient=false)
